problem_text_cn: 如图已知⊙O与△ABC三边均相交,在三边上截得的线段DE=FG=HK,∠A=50°,则∠BOC的度数为()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, it is known that ⊙O and △ABC intersect on three edges, and the line segment tangent on the three edges DE = FG = HK, ∠A = N_0, then the degree of ∠BOC is ()
raw_answer: 解:如图,连接OB、OC,作OM⊥AB于M,OQ⊥AC于Q,ON⊥BC于N,∴∠AMO=∠AQO=90°,∵∠A=50°,∴∠MOQ=130°,∵DE=FG=HK,∴OM=ON=OQ,∴OB、OC平分∠ABC和∠ACB,∴∠BOC=\frac{1}{2}×(360°-130°)=115°．故选:C．
